snake_oil.name: Snake Oil
snake_oil.desc: Okay, the amount you're charging people for your items is downright criminal. But I'm just a talent description, I can't stop you.

golden_tongue.name: Golden Tongue
golden_tongue.desc: Typing gives a random buff to you and those around you. (60 second cooldown)

friends_in_high_places.name: Friends in High Places
friends_in_high_places.desc: Your connections often let you off the hook when you're in trouble with the law. Nepotism sure does pay!
